53d9aeee19cedb762bbcfbebcc249131.address: Apartment 617 1718 P Street, NW Washington DC
53d9aeee19cedb762bbcfbebcc249131.tip: In 1972 apartment 617 belonged to Washington Post reporter Bob Woodward and if his contact Mark Felt (also known as 'Deep Throat') wanted to meet, he would mark Woodward's morning paper with a code indicating a meeting time.

6f17e3d23dd8c71e1b19ca73e24acea6.tip: In 1972 this address served as the headquarters for the Committee to Re-elect the President, a fundraising organization for President Richard Nixon that played an active role in the Watergate scandal. CRP (also known as CREEP) paid the legal expenses of the Watergate burglars in exchange for their silence, which included a member of their payroll and eventually led to the unraveling of the scandal that ended with Nixon's resignation.
6f17e3d23dd8c71e1b19ca73e24acea6.place: Offices of the Committee to Re-elect the President

f2ad216f0d80f1d89cdb464c6fef2cb0.tip: The site of KayGold LLC, a front group of former superlobbyist and convicted criminal Jack Abramoff that was used to funnel lobbying fees into his personal accounts.

67cccb69219b84e9830195aca4592210.tip: The long time mistress of Rep. Don Sherwood, R-Pa., locked herself in the bathroom of his home and called 911, alleging the congressman strangled her.

e666deaeb26de79f6aa27638c0d11596.address: Barracks Row, 8th street SE, Washington DC
e666deaeb26de79f6aa27638c0d11596.tip: Rep. Jerry Lewis, R-Calif.,has earmarked $2.75 million federal dollars since 2004 to the Barracks Row neighborhood where he owns a three bedroom house.
e666deaeb26de79f6aa27638c0d11596.scandal: The Rep. Jerry Lewis and  former-Rep. Lowery (now lobbyist) controversy?

88f7d6f7d3febf322e411936c5677aae.tip: The Council of Republicans for Environmental Advocacy was one of the non-profits implicated in the Jack Abramoff scandal. They alledgedly laundered funds from Abramoff clients in exchange for favorable publicity and connections with high level officials.
88f7d6f7d3febf322e411936c5677aae.link: AP - 'Fundraiser pleads guilty in lobby probe' also: http://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2006/10/12/AR2006101200889.html
88f7d6f7d3febf322e411936c5677aae.place: Council of Republicans for Environmental Advocacy

5dba9e261de0d3051ec46460aabe1526.address: 1101 Pennsylvania Ave, NW Ste. 600 Washington, DC
5dba9e261de0d3051ec46460aabe1526.tip: The site of the Capital Athletic Foundation, a 501(c)(3) organization founded in 2000 by superlobbyist and convicted criminal Jack Abramoff. It was a major money laundering operation that distributed funds to Abramoff's various activities.

481e83830228a8aeb36858099010a74c.tip: Signatures was a short-lived restaurant run by superlobbyist and convicted criminal Jack Abramoff that served as another medium to funnel money from clients to politicans.

0ca5ed3fade10db96eaef461604c81d5.tip: The site of Eshkol Academy, a defunct Orthodox Jewish boys day school founded by superlobbyist and convicted criminal Jack Abramoff in 2002. The school was largely funded by laundered money through Abramoff's Capital Athletic Foundation.

fe78300e3e0f173783a0b1a351e1e7fd.tip: Current federal inmate and former congressman Randy "Duke" Cunningham lived in a yacht here, owned by a defense contractor, and even secured earmarks to renovate the area.

fe7d2e53ffb15845d2e101bb30edb20d.address: 2600 Adams Mill Rd NW Washington, DC
fe7d2e53ffb15845d2e101bb30edb20d.tip: In 2001, then-congressman Gary Condit, D-Calif., allowed police to search his apartment after misleading police about an affair he had with his intern Chandra Levy who had recently disappeared. He was spotted disposing a gift box hours before police entered the premises.

0e960fa4ba1abadb8725b2b483222d10.tip: Former Rep. William J. Jefferson, D-La., stuffed cash for bribes in the freezer of his Washington DC home. He is now serving the longest sentence ever given to a member of Congress.

4ded8443f198ae1a7a9233efdf8cbf52.tip: The now-defunct Alexander Strategy Group was a lobbying shop that worked closely with superlobbyist Jack Abramoff, former Rep. Randy 'Duke' Cunningham, R-Calif., and former Republican House majority leader Tom DeLay - all convicted criminals for various levels of corruption.

da0ec7d6c1a81fe1f2bc1744f9cf7c6c.address: Parking space 34D, 1401 Wilson Blvd Arlington, VA 22209
da0ec7d6c1a81fe1f2bc1744f9cf7c6c.tip: In 1972, Washington Post reporter Bob Woodward met with former FBI official Mark Felt (also known as 'Deep Throat') in parking space 34D on the bottom level of this parking garage. Felt provided key information to the Washington Post that eventually led to the resignation of President Nixon.
da0ec7d6c1a81fe1f2bc1744f9cf7c6c.place: Meeting place of Bob Woodward and Deep Throat/Mark Felt

649eb976b9acc811bb46b050ca7fa753.tip: The site of the U.S. Family Network, a tax-exempt 501(c)(4) organization deeply involved with former superlobbyist and convicted criminal Jack Abramoff. USFN was largely funded by Abramoff clients and included a 15-year lease on a Redskins skybox, frequently used by Abramoff.

4972ee0f53cb22a843e88d0069d67475.tip: In 2008, Former New York Governor Eliot Spitzer had an affair with a $1,000+ an hour prostitute in Room 871 of the Mayflower Hotel.

bc9f4c86570404d5df9197f368577e88.tip: The site of Capitol Campaign Strategies, a public relations firm founded in 2001 by Michael Scanlon, Tom DeLay's former press secretary and Jack Abramoff's partner. The organization defrauded Native American tribes of millions of dollars in the corruption scheme to split billings 50/50 with Abramoff that the pair affectionately referred to as 'Gimme Five.'

1058a76a0c4307bbf120c4af209959ed.tip: In 1974 a car was pulled over near the Jefferson Memorial for not using headlights. The vehicle contained an intoxicated Rep. Wilbur Mills, D-Ariz., and Fanne Foxe, a well known local stripper, who promptly leaped from the car into the Tidal Basin.

03f1224e051e30e531a7db0db44fff24.tip: Americans for Tax Reform was one of the non-profits implicated in the Jack Abramoff scandal in 2006. They alledgedly laundered funds from Abramoff clients in exchange for favorable publicity and connections with high level officials, including then-President George W. Bush.

bbe2c02fddae542c03c1ee2e5c62a46d.tip: In 1987 a woman was seen leaving the Washington residence of recently announced presidential candidate Gary Hart. Photos of the two of them on the luxury yacht, Monkey Business, lead to Hart pulling out of the race.

175305beaf29023fbfba679fd5a10596.tip: The home of former superlobbyist and convicted criminal Jack Abramoff that at one time served as the business address for KayGold LLC, a front group he used to funnel money into his personal accounts.

b8b9685d917780058b0fadc8506aa04e.address: Newport Condominium - 1260 21st St. NW Washington DC
b8b9685d917780058b0fadc8506aa04e.tip: The apartment building where murdered Hill intern, Chandra Levy, lived and possible meeting spot for the affair she had with Rep. Gary Condit, D-Calif.

e66c0e1d8a1cc1fa375471e9e4b84a7e.tip: Current federal inmate and former congressman Randy "Duke" Cunningham frequented the Westin Grand Hotel with prostitutes and a limo, all provided by a defense contractor that Cunningham helped get multi-million dollar contracts.

d2aa5a3852072a40d081515bb1636036.address: 1523 New Hampshire Ave. NW Washington, DC
d2aa5a3852072a40d081515bb1636036.tip: CACI-Athena, Inc., formerly known as MZM, Inc., was founded by Mitchell Wade who admitted to bribing former congressman Randy "Duke" Cunningham with more than $1 million including cash, antiques and payment for yachts to obtain lucrative defense contracts.

189e8d03408b17b0823f41fcbe35db21.address: Western Ridge Trail - Rock Creek Park, Washington DC
189e8d03408b17b0823f41fcbe35db21.tip: The body of Chandra Levy was found in Rock Creek Park in 2002 after a high profile investigation that lead to revelations of an affair between the Hill intern and former-congressman Gary Condit, D-Calif.

08e5cc523a24bc90754199d2aa9dc930.tip: In 2006, Rep. Mark Foley, R-Fla., sent sexually suggestive instant messages to teenaged boys who had formerly served as congressional pages. The ensuing scandal included members of the Republican leadership who sought to hamper the investigation.

23e4ef2580f674900faad1de4ffddeeb.tip: Jack Abramoff, former superlobbyist and convicted criminal, worked at Preston Gates & Ellis (now known as Kirkpatrick & Lockhart Preston Gates Ellis LLP) as a lobbyist from 1994 to 2001.
23e4ef2580f674900faad1de4ffddeeb.place: Preston Gates & Ellis (now known as Kirkpatrick & Lockhart Preston Gates Ellis LLP)

5d98aca020c73ca015d14746e974488e.tip: Citronelle was the site of a $2,800 meal where defense contractor Mitchell Wade gave former congresswoman Katherine Harris a campaign contribution in exchange for a promise to earmark a $10 million contract.

5cacaaac25b57bc3273a68ff79c011eb.address: Longoworth House Office Building Washington, DC
5cacaaac25b57bc3273a68ff79c011eb.tip: In 1976 it was revealed that Rep. Wayne L. Hays, D-Ohio kept his mistress on his staff as a clerk with a private office. She admitted she couldn't type, file or answer a phone.

ebbf210c2446d5c5a1cca5b6a56fdfff.tip: In the mid-1990s the House Speaker Newt Gingrich had an affair with a staffer named Callista Bisek while leading the charge into President Clinton infidelities.

8afcd288b886db4937b3a2bc5259e917.tip: Clinton adviser Dick Morris frequented a prostitute in the mid-1990s at the Jefferson Hotel and allowed her to eavesdrop on phone calls with the President.

763881abdbc45e94b911082be6e07974.address: NO SPECIFIC ADDRESS KNOWN - Silver Spring, MD
763881abdbc45e94b911082be6e07974.tip: The site of GrassRoots Interactive, a defunct lobbying shop controlled by Jack Abramoff that was implicated in the network of political corruption.
